> OOC:  Yeah, that's right,  I they were looking for Blacknightmare,
> that would be the last place their scaners would have seen her.  A
> ways outside town.  They would also know maximals and preds converged
> on the area.  (this is like 3 months ago in game time...)
> 
> I'm not sure who gets to do this, Airly, Nic and I have been sharing
> this area.  I can describe the site though since the fight was in
> Airly and my posts.

Any one who can give a description would be great! At the moment I
believe my team is just looking for evidence as to Blacknightmare's
location. Its funny my characters know more then me as a player does.
Perhaps any obvious witnesses would be helpful?? I may need some
helpful steering, and I will see if i can locate the old posts sometime
soon.

Thanks
Preston
